name: Unicorn Runner 2019 - Running Game
description:
Hey Kids, do you love UNICORNS?? Well, play with colorful unicorns in an endless run game adventure. Go on a trip with your favorite pony into their magical land & get ready to RUN, DASH, JUMP & have FUN in this Fairy Tale Game Adventure. Get upgraded to a powerful UNICORN which can SLIDE, FLY & RUN through the magical fantasy land. The gameplay is simple, you just have to follow the game's challenges & make sure each one of them is fulfilled so that you can collect coins for upgrades.
Surprise!!!!! You can grab all the gifts inside the game & avail exclusive coupons which can be redeemed.

Have fun with the unicorns & their amazing powers in this running game adventure. This is the BEST run game for all UNICORN Lovers!!

Download & play an amazing endless running game UNICORN RUN 2019.

Unicorn Runner 2019 Highlights & Features:

*Best RUN Game to play
*Unlock The Magical Pony Unicorn Characters
*Play as 10 Different Unicorns in Cool & Cute Colors
*Collect Coins & Get Hearts to Upgrade
*Open Surprises & Exclusive Rewards in this running game
*Enjoyable KIDS run game adventure
*Escape from Obstacles with Hover board, Wings etc
*Avail super cool offers for purchases
*Collect & Upgrade Loads of Awesome Powerups
*FREE Updates, New Characters Added Regularly
*Amazing HD Graphics

Do you like this Unicorn Runner 2019?? Don't forget to leave a review with your feedback. It will mean the world for us!
